name: JellySSO Companion
description: Single Sign-On authentication plugin that integrates Jellyfin with JellySSO for OIDC-based user authentication and management
overview: Enable seamless SSO authentication for your Jellyfin server using JellySSO. Automatically create users, validate sessions, and synchronize user permissions from your identity provider.

versions.changelog:
Initial release
- SSO token validation
- Automatic user creation
- Session management
- Admin permission sync
- Integration with JellySSO companion app
